text: Ezɨ atrivim, nɨ gumazibav kemeghtɨ me akar gavgavir kam akɨnafarimɨn an osirightɨ, nɨ uan ziam osirightɨ an akar gavgavir kam a damutɨ a gavgavigham. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar an gɨn mangam. Akar kam e Midia ko Persia, a en akar gavgavim, an e bagh ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam. Gumazitam anebighan kogham.”
